subject: New York City Marathon
Running
lead_paragraph: The former marathon champions Alberto Salazar and Joan Benoit Samuelson, and Olympic champion Hicham el-Guerrouj will pace Lance Armstrong for his debut in the New York City Marathon.
snippet: The former marathon champions Alberto Salazar and Joan Benoit Samuelson, and Olympic champion Hicham el-Guerrouj will pace Lance Armstrong for his debut in the New York City Marathon.
